scripts.git-freeze: shx touch .git-freeze && git add -A && git stash push -m "invoked by package.json" && git stash apply
scripts.git-unfreeze: git reset --hard && git clean -df && git stash pop && shx rm -f .git-freeze && git add .git-freeze
scripts.antora-copy: shx rm -rf ./.next/antora/partials && shx mkdir -p ./.next/antora/partials && shx cp -r ./docs/antora/partials/* ./.next/antora/partials && shx mkdir -p ./public && shx cp -r ./docs/antora/assets/* ./public
scripts.antora-factory: npm run antora-factory-nav && npm run antora-factory-include && npm run antora-factory-menu
scripts.inject: npm run inject-opengraph && npm run inject-umami && npm run inject-env
scripts.antora: npm run git-freeze && npm run antora-copy && npm run antora-factory && antora --stacktrace ./antora-playbook.yml --to-dir ./public && npm run inject && npm run git-unfreeze
scripts.vercel-build: npm run antora && npm run build
